title: Best Car Interior Cleaners for 2025, Tested
content: Car and Driver's Gear Team tested nine interior cleaners to identify the top-performing products for cleaning dashboards, steering wheels, and other interior surfaces.
author: Car and Driver Gear Team

title: Tested: Best Car Scratch Removers for 2025
content: The Meguiar's Scratch Eraser Kit was selected as the best overall scratch remover due to its effectiveness, ease of use, and speed in eliminating surface scratches.
author: Car and Driver Gear Team

title: Best Car Wash Soap for 2025, Tested
content: Car and Driver evaluated various car wash soaps to determine the best options for effectively cleaning vehicles without damaging the paint or finish.
author: Car and Driver Gear Team

title: Tested: Best Car Steam Cleaners for 2025
content: Car and Driver's Gear Team tested several car steam cleaners on a 20-year-old farm van to assess their effectiveness in deep-cleaning vehicle interiors.
author: Car and Driver Gear Team

title: Most Reliable Car Brands for 2025
content: MotorTrend's 2025 study highlights Mazda's rise in reliability rankings, with the CX-5 and CX-9 recognized for their dependability in their respective SUV segments.
author: MotorTrend Staff
